Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H935>brought<s%> it, and <S%H6213>done<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>said:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> ye have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> therefore <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H1961>come<s%> upon you.

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H6605>loose<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H246>chains<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> it seem good unto <S%H2896>thee<s%> <S%H5869><s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H935>come;<s%> and I will look <S%H7760>well<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> thee: but <S%H518>if<s%> it seem ill unto <S%H7489>thee<s%> <S%H5869><s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me into <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H2308>forbear:<s%> <S%H7200>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: <S%H413>whither<s%> it <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>convenient<s%> for thee to <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H1980>go.<s%>

Likewise <S%H1571><s%> when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and among the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5983><s%> and in <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H834>that<s%> were in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>countries,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H5414>left<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> he had <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan;<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Dost thou certainly <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1185>Baalis<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5983><s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> to <S%H5221>slay<s%> <S%H5315><s%> thee?
